overview: By 1910, the world was on the verge of tumultuous change. Economic shifts were taking place that would allow the United States to emerge as the richest country in the world. But for fifteen European schoolboys, the intimate lessons of love, lust and longing were their only concerns. This charming cast of classmates learns about each other in private ways that no academic setting would ever dare offer. Take a trip back in time as a turn of the century cast of cuties recaptures the time of a bygone era.
title: Bareback Schoolboys of 1910
